General.Name: De Longhi SpA
General.Description: De'Longhi S.p.A. manufactures and distributes coffee making products, food preparation and cooking machines, and air treatment and home care products. The company provides its products primarily under the De' Longhi, Kenwood, Braun, Ariete, Nutribullet, and Magic Bullet brands. It operates in Europe, the Americas, the Asia Pacific, the Middle East, India, and Africa. The company is headquartered in Treviso, Italy. De'Longhi S.p.A. operates as a subsidiary of De Longhi Industrial S.A.
General.Address: Via Lodovico Seitz 47, Treviso, TV, Italy, 31100
